tools.name: Hand Trowel
tools.description: A small handheld tool used for digging, planting, and transplanting small plants.

tools.name: Pruning Shears
tools.description: A tool used for cutting and trimming plants, shrubs, and small tree branches.

tools.name: Hoe
tools.description: A tool with a flat blade used for breaking up soil and removing weeds.

tools.name: Lawn Mower
tools.description: A machine used for cutting grass on lawns and sports fields.

tools.name: Leaf Rake
tools.description: A tool used for gathering leaves, grass clippings, and other debris from lawns and gardens.

tools.name: Garden Fork
tools.description: A tool with pointed tines used for loosening and turning over soil.

tools.name: Wheelbarrow
tools.description: A small hand-propelled vehicle with a single wheel, used for carrying small loads of soil, compost, or other materials.

tools.name: Weed Puller
tools.description: A tool used for removing weeds from the ground by pulling them out at the root.

tools.name: Electric Hedge Trimmer
tools.description: A powered tool used for cutting and trimming hedges and bushes.

tools.name: Watering Can
tools.description: A container used for carrying and pouring water onto plants and flowers.

tools.name: Gardening Gloves
tools.description: Protective gloves used to prevent injury and dirt while gardening.

tools.name: Sprinkler
tools.description: A device used for distributing water evenly across a lawn or garden.

tools.name: Hedge Shears
tools.description: A tool used for cutting and shaping hedges and bushes.

tools.name: Pruning Saw
tools.description: A saw used for cutting thick branches and stems on trees and shrubs.

tools.name: Garden Scissors
tools.description: Small scissors used for trimming and shaping plants and flowers.

tools.name: Shovel
tools.description: A tool used for digging, lifting, and moving soil, sand, or other materials.

tools.name: Compost Bin
tools.description: A container used for holding compostable materials and allowing them to decompose into nutrient-rich soil.

tools.name: Garden Cart
tools.description: A cart used for transporting plants, soil, and other gardening materials around a yard or garden.

tools.name: Garden Kneeler
tools.description: A padded platform used for kneeling on while gardening to reduce strain on knees and back.

tools.name: Hand Cultivator
tools.description: A handheld tool with pointed tines used for breaking up soil and removing weeds.

tools.name: Garden Hose
tools.description: A flexible tube used for delivering water to plants and flowers in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Lopping Shears
tools.description: A tool used for pruning and trimming larger branches and stems on trees and shrubs.

tools.name: Garden Sprayer
tools.description: A device used for spraying water or liquid fertilizer onto plants in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Plant Labels
tools.description: Small tags used for labeling plants in a garden or greenhouse.

tools.name: Garden Fork and Trowel Set
tools.description: A set of handheld tools used for digging, planting, and transplanting small plants.

tools.name: Garden Twine
tools.description: A string used for tying and supporting plants in a garden or greenhouse.

tools.name: Garden Gnome
tools.description: A decorative figurine placed in a garden or lawn for ornamental purposes.

tools.name: Soil pH Meter
tools.description: A tool used for measuring the acidity or alkalinity of soil in a garden or greenhouse.

tools.name: Garden Edging
tools.description: A border used to separate different areas in a garden or lawn, such as flower beds and grassy areas.

tools.name: Garden Netting
tools.description: A mesh net used to protect plants in a garden or greenhouse from insects and birds.

tools.name: Garden Trellis
tools.description: A decorative framework used to support climbing plants and flowers in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Garden Thermometer
tools.description: A device used for measuring the temperature of soil and air in a garden or greenhouse.

tools.name: Rain Gauge
tools.description: A device used for measuring the amount of rainfall in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Garden Hose Reel
tools.description: A reel used for storing and organizing a garden hose in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Garden Tool Organizer
tools.description: A storage rack used for organizing and holding garden tools in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Garden Hose Nozzle
tools.description: A nozzle used for controlling the flow of water from a garden hose and adjusting the spray pattern for watering plants.

tools.name: Pruning Saw
tools.description: A saw used for pruning and trimming larger branches and stems on trees and shrubs.

tools.name: Plant Cages
tools.description: Wire cages used for supporting and training plants, such as tomato plants, in a garden or greenhouse.

tools.name: Garden Gloves
tools.description: Protective gloves worn while gardening to protect hands and fingers from thorns, dirt, and other hazards.

tools.name: Garden Sprinkler
tools.description: A device used for watering a large area of grass or plants in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Garden Seeder
tools.description: A tool used for planting seeds in rows in a garden or greenhouse.

tools.name: Fertilizer Spreader
tools.description: A tool used for spreading fertilizer evenly over a large area of grass or plants in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Garden Tote Bag
tools.description: A tote bag used for carrying and storing small gardening tools and supplies.

tools.name: Garden Tool Belt
tools.description: A belt worn while gardening with pockets and loops for holding and organizing small gardening tools.

tools.name: Garden Hose Timer
tools.description: A device used for automating the watering of plants in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Leaf Rake
tools.description: A rake used for collecting and removing leaves and other debris from a lawn or garden.

tools.name: Hedge Shears
tools.description: A tool used for trimming and shaping hedges and shrubs in a garden or lawn.

tools.name: Garden Tool Sharpener
tools.description: A tool used for sharpening dull gardening tools, such as shears and pruners.

tools.name: Garden Watering Can
tools.description: A container used for manually watering plants in a garden or greenhouse.

tools.name: Garden Shears
tools.description: A tool used for pruning and trimming smaller branches and stems on trees and shrubs.
